attributes.additional_details:
So we can work and not risk our businesses . 
I would like enforced guidance in place not just guidelines. Stricter on ppe and track and tracing. One in one out would eliminate the risk to others and ourselves. 
Having your hair done is in fact a promotion of well being.
attributes.background:
I would like you to rethink on the hair industry reopening under tougher guidelines.
This industry has a large portion of self employed  who cannot claim anything or receive a grant.
